description:
Realizing that she still loves singing, Kanon decides to become a school idol. However, Hazuki Ren insists that school idols are not needed at Yuigaoka. Kanon tries to find Ren`s weakness with Chisato`s help only to find out that many students trust her.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: スクールアイドル禁止!?
